com.poesys.db.dao
Class DaoManager

java.lang.Object
  com.poesys.db.dao.DaoManager

public final class DaoManager
extends java.lang.Object

A singleton object that manages data access objects in the system. The manager maintains a singleton map of caches which is available on demand and a flag showing global caching status. You use this flag to create caching factories (true) or direct factories (false) as appropriate.`

Author:
Robert J. Muller

Method Detail

isCaching

public static boolean isCaching()
Get the caching.

Returns:
Returns the caching.

setCaching

public static void setCaching(boolean value)
Set the caching statis. Setting caching to false clears any caches currently in effect.

Parameters:
value - true to turn caching on, false to turn it off

getFactory

public static <T extends IDbDto,C extends java.util.Collection<T>> IDaoFactory<T> getFactory(java.lang.String name)
Get a DAO factory of the appropriate type for the framework.

Type Parameters:
T - the type of IDbDto that the factory caches
C - the type of collection used for inserting the DTOs
Parameters:
name - the class name of the object that the DAO processes, used for naming a potential cache of such objects; the name may be null if the system does not cache objects.
Returns:
the DAO factory

logCacheMap

public static void logCacheMap()
Log the cache names in the cache map to the debug log.

isCached

public static boolean isCached(java.lang.String name)
Is a class with a specified name cached in the DAO cache map?

Parameters:
name - the name of the class
Returns:
true if the class has a cache, false if it does not

getCache

public static <T extends IDbDto> IDtoCache<T> getCache(java.lang.String name)
Is a class with a specified name cached in the DAO cache map?

Type Parameters:
T - the type of IDbDto cached
Parameters:
name - the name of the class
Returns:
true if the class has a cache, false if it does not

createCache

public static <T extends IDbDto> IDtoCache<T> createCache(java.lang.String name)
Create a cache of IDbDto objects of class T with a specified name.

Type Parameters:
T - the type of IDbDto objects to cache
Parameters:
name - the fully qualified name of the T class
Returns:
the newly created cache

clearCache

public static <T extends IDbDto> void clearCache(java.lang.String name)
Clear a specific cache for type T identified by the fully qualifed name of the class cached. This is usually used only in testing.

Type Parameters:
T - the type of class cached
Parameters:
name - the fully qualified name of the cached class
